Always ensure that you have created and attached the appropriate NPC Speaker. This is a second line of dialogue. As a rule Lorebooks should stick to around 3-4 sentences of lore.
Lorebook_Item_Template.name: [PH]Lorebook

Lorebook_Item_Tirmair.desc: {PH] A rubbing of the runes on the old druid stone in Tirmair
Lorebook_Item_Tirmair.flavor: [PH] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
Lorebook_Item_Tirmair.name: [PH] Druid Stone Rubbings

Lorebook_Item_YorinJournal_01.desc: A Journal Entry on Yorin's hope for the future
Lorebook_Item_YorinJournal_01.flavor: [PH] Every year the Cathedral of Light makes more headway in Scosglen.  While people have been slow to accept us, I am hopeful for the future.  We can show people the Knights Penitent are here to fight alongside them as my father fought alongside Perun and Airidah.  I'm proud to carry his legacy forward.
Lorebook_Item_YorinJournal_01.name: [PH] Yorin's Hope

Lorebook_Item_ZakFortKeep_Paladin_Lord.desc: A small moldy tome with a ribbon marking the final journal entry.
Lorebook_Item_ZakFortKeep_Paladin_Lord.flavor: I will become maggot food if I don't-
Lorebook_Item_ZakFortKeep_Paladin_Lord.name: Old book

Lorebook_Item_ZakFortKeep_Paladin_Lord_E.desc: A neat parchment with an elaborate header.
Lorebook_Item_ZakFortKeep_Paladin_Lord_E.flavor: A second missive from Lord Carthas
Lorebook_Item_ZakFortKeep_Paladin_Lord_E.name: Confessions of Lord Carthas

Lorebook_Item_ZakFortKeep_Paladin_Orders.flavor: A paladin laments their mission here
Lorebook_Item_ZakFortKeep_Paladin_Orders.name: Paladin's Record

OW_LostMap_Item.flavor: Next to the river, along the sea, a lonesome tree, stands guard for me.
OW_LostMap_Item.name: Treasure Note

QST_Blacksmith_Wood.desc: A dry log, stored out of the snow.
QST_Blacksmith_Wood.name: Dry Firewood

QST_Class_Barb_Beast_Item.flavor: The Beast's head, encrusted with fried gore, still gives off an unnatural aura.
QST_Class_Barb_Beast_Item.name: Head of the Beast

QST_Class_Barb_Reward_Helm.desc: A fearsome helm, crafted from the skull of a fallen beast.
QST_Class_Barb_Reward_Helm.flavor: The beast's bleached skull has accumulated an impressive collection of gouges and dents, both in life and afterwards.
QST_Class_Barb_Reward_Helm.name: Bone Helm of the Beast

QST_Class_Necro_Bone.desc: A bone from a fallen enemy, mostly intact
QST_Class_Necro_Bone.flavor: This bone looks worthy of crafting into the body of a Golem
QST_Class_Necro_Bone.name: Unbroken Bone

QST_Class_Sorc_Item_Paper.desc: A random page of the Forgotten Codex
QST_Class_Sorc_Item_Paper.flavor: Scribbled with camped lines of obscure runes
QST_Class_Sorc_Item_Paper.name: Codex Page

QST_Class_Sorc_Page.desc: A random page of the Forgotten Codex
QST_Class_Sorc_Page.flavor: Scribbled with camped lines of obscure runes
QST_Class_Sorc_Page.name: Codex Page

QST_Class_Sorc_Reward_Focus.desc: Enchantment Techniques of the Ennead Mage Clan
QST_Class_Sorc_Reward_Focus.flavor: "A loosely bundled collection of ancient pages, covered with obscure runes. The sheaf of papers has an odd, organic feel when grasped, as though alive in some way."
QST_Class_Sorc_Reward_Focus.name: Forgotten Codex

QST_Conv_Donan_Letter.desc: A parchment sealed with a cryptic rune
QST_Conv_Donan_Letter.flavor: This letter between two Horadrim is written is a script that you cannot decipher.
QST_Conv_Donan_Letter.name: A Letter from Lorath to Donan

QST_Convergence_Act_Amulet.flavor: The Star beguiles. The threads of fate converge, but its story is not done.
QST_Convergence_Act_Amulet.name: The Nexus Star

QST_Craft_Alchemist_Spores.desc: A clump of spores from an Howler Moss plant
QST_Craft_Alchemist_Spores.name: Howler Spores

QST_DryS_KedBardu_FetchMinor_01.flavor: [PH] Stolen food supplies from Ked Bardu Merchants
QST_DryS_KedBardu_FetchMinor_01.name: Stolen Supplies

QST_Epilogue_NeyLetter.desc: A letter from Neyrelle written in Horadric runes. Lorath will want to read this.
QST_Epilogue_NeyLetter.name: Runed Scroll

QST_Frac_BearTribeMedallion.flavor: Carried only by members of the Bear Tribe
QST_Frac_BearTribeMedallion.name: Medallion of the Bear

QST_Frac_BeastChal_Goat_Heart_Quest.flavor: The skull of Kauller is heavy for its size and appears fixed in a sightless snarl.
QST_Frac_BeastChal_Goat_Heart_Quest.name: Skull of Kauller

QST_Frac_Brothers_Lorebook_CaravanBody.desc: Written by the dead woman traveling with the caravan. Bloodied and scrawled.
QST_Frac_Brothers_Lorebook_CaravanBody.flavor: The caravan has been destroyed. Bandits, curse their names. I escaped, but they're looking for me. One of them thinks I'm hiding secret riches. HA! Idiots. I think I saw a young man from the town with them. Did the town betray us? Those zealots refused to give us shelter and now look, everyone is dead. This journal may be all that's left of me. If anyone finds this, don't return to the town. There is a traitor there.
QST_Frac_Brothers_Lorebook_CaravanBody.name: Hastily Written Journal

QST_Frac_Brothers_Note_FarewellNote.desc: A poorly written but heartfelt letter from Peirthan to Lacthan.
QST_Frac_Brothers_Note_FarewellNote.flavor: Brother, I've done it. I've found a way to finally to turn our fortunes around. This one will work, I'm sure of it! I'm going to make us rich, our family will never go hungry again. Don't try to follow me. With love, Perithan.
QST_Frac_Brothers_Note_FarewellNote.name: A Farewell Letter

QST_Frac_Cathedral_Vigo_FaithMedallion.flavor: This medallion is given to outsiders as a token of good faith. Iosef said it will grant access to Kor Valar.
QST_Frac_Cathedral_Vigo_FaithMedallion.name: Knights Penitent Medallion of the Faithful

QST_Frac_Consecrator_Looted_Reward.flavor: This ruined staff was once an ornate status symbol for the Arch-Consecrator. Now it reeks of sulfur and burnt flesh.
QST_Frac_Consecrator_Looted_Reward.name: Charred Staff of the Arch-Confessor

QST_Frac_CutthroatsEscape_Key.flavor: The old mining tunnels were the perfect way to move goods--or people--through the mountains without attracting unwanted attention.
QST_Frac_CutthroatsEscape_Key.name: Smuggler's Key

QST_Frac_DeadMill_GhoulHeart.flavor: The pulsing of this horrid heart secretes an oily mucus.
QST_Frac_DeadMill_GhoulHeart.name: Ghoul Heart

QST_Frac_DeadPilgrim_Journal.flavor: ...I'm looking forward to my studies at the Cathedral. I hope to find peace amongst the books there and their well kept secrets. Priest Malone would expect nothing less before I return to Margrave. Perhaps he will see us as equals? Doubtful, but I will should at minimum earn his respect...
QST_Frac_DeadPilgrim_Journal.name: Pilgrim's Journal

QST_Frac_DepthsOfDespair_Chalice.flavor: An ornate chalice of precious metal bearing the mark of the Cathedral of Light. There is a strange patina coating the inside of the bowl.
QST_Frac_DepthsOfDespair_Chalice.name: Holy Chalice

QST_Frac_DreadMartyr_Lorebook.flavor: This damaged parchment appears to be written hastily in freshly dried blood presumably by Avitus, the vampire.
QST_Frac_DreadMartyr_Lorebook.name: Bloody Parchment

QST_Frac_FaithInBlood_BloodyChalice.flavor: An ornate chalice of precious metal bearing the mark of the Cathedral of Light. The inside of the bowl is coated with blood.
QST_Frac_FaithInBlood_BloodyChalice.name: Blood-Filled Chalice

QST_Frac_FaithInBlood_FinishedChalice.flavor: An ornate chalice of precious metal bearing the mark of the Cathedral of Light. There is a strange patina coating the inside of the bowl.
QST_Frac_FaithInBlood_FinishedChalice.name: Holy Chalice

QST_Frac_FaithInBlood_MundaneChalice.flavor: An ornate chalice of precious metal bearing the mark of the Cathedral of Light. It is well-polished and appears to have never been used.
QST_Frac_FaithInBlood_MundaneChalice.name: Silver Chalice

QST_Frac_FaithInBlood_OctaviaLetter.flavor: A hastily-written note from Sister Octavia. It describes her worsening health and suspicions that the demon you encountered in the sewers was not destroyed, but instead took her as its next host.
QST_Frac_FaithInBlood_OctaviaLetter.name: Sister Octavia's Letter

QST_Frac_FaithInBlood_PrayerBook.flavor: A well-loved book of litanies, prayers and psalms. Certain words are underlined, perhaps due to a deeply personal significance to those passages.
QST_Frac_FaithInBlood_PrayerBook.name: Sister Octavia's Prayer Book

QST_Frac_ForgiveMe_Note.flavor: Dearest Roza, it pains me to say that our plans, our hopes, our dreams, our lives together... they can be no longer. Something unforeseen has destroyed the one you once knew, and I fear that I am now damned. I beg you, please never come looking for me. I will love you forever. Sign, your Julek.
QST_Frac_ForgiveMe_Note.name: Bloodied Note

QST_Frac_GaleValley_RareHarvest_Ore.desc: A geode with several intact gems inside.
QST_Frac_GaleValley_RareHarvest_Ore.flavor: A rare, gem-laden geode. A local jeweler sells has tools to open it.
QST_Frac_GaleValley_RareHarvest_Ore.name: Icebound Geode

QST_Frac_GaleValley_RareHarvest_OreKit.desc: A cloudy vial filled with acid flux.
QST_Frac_GaleValley_RareHarvest_OreKit.flavor: This will help with opening one rare Fractured Peaks geode.
QST_Frac_GaleValley_RareHarvest_OreKit.name: Acid Flux

QST_Frac_Glac_Caretaker_Lorebook.desc: This small booklet was wedged between the teeth of a hanging corpse.
QST_Frac_Glac_Caretaker_Lorebook.flavor: The booklet marker is set to the final entry.
QST_Frac_Glac_Caretaker_Lorebook.name: Caretaker Emeryk's Journal

QST_Frac_Glac_Vamp_Lorebook.desc: A parchment written in recently dried blood.
QST_Frac_Glac_Vamp_Lorebook.flavor: This damaged parchment appears to be written hastily in freshly dried blood presumably by Caretaker Emeryk of Saints College.
QST_Frac_Glac_Vamp_Lorebook.name: Bloody Parchment

QST_Frac_GoldSpent_Gems.flavor: This large bag bears the mark of Merchant Meros and is heavy with a various gems inside.
QST_Frac_GoldSpent_Gems.name: Payment of Gemstones

QST_Frac_HamGriz_BarbHammer_Reward.flavor: The fabled hammer is considered sacred to barbarians of the Bear Tribe.
QST_Frac_HamGriz_BarbHammer_Reward.name: Hammer of the Grizzly

QST_Frac_HamGriz_Hammer_Quest.flavor: The fabled hammer is considered sacred to barbarians of the Bear Tribe.
QST_Frac_HamGriz_Hammer_Quest.name: Hammer of the Grizzly

QST_Frac_HoradricBook.flavor: A worn and dusty book with a faded horadric seal on the cover
QST_Frac_HoradricBook.name: Lesser Verses and Incantations

QST_Frac_Inheritance2_Axe.flavor: The axe is still slick with blood that seems to soak through any cloth wrapping the blade.
QST_Frac_Inheritance2_Axe.name: The Woodsman's Axe

QST_Frac_Inheritance_Axe.flavor: The axe is still slick with blood that seems to soak through any cloth wrapping the blade.
QST_Frac_Inheritance_Axe.name: The Woodsman's Axe

QST_Frac_KhazraBone.flavor: Bones of Ice Clan khazra, splintered in combat. The young chieftain of the Bear Tribe barbarians, known for his fondness of crushing weapons, collects them with pride.
QST_Frac_KhazraBone.name: Ice Clan Bones

QST_Frac_MaladyOfTheSoul_Chalice.flavor: An ornate chalice of precious metal bearing the mark of the Cathedral of Light. There is a strange patina coating the inside of the bowl.
QST_Frac_MaladyOfTheSoul_Chalice.name: Holy Chalice

QST_Frac_MeneCoffers_Tithe.flavor: This ledger details a heavy tithing requirement due to the Church of Light. There are several tabbed sections noting inconsistencies and incorrect figures.
QST_Frac_MeneCoffers_Tithe.name: Tithing Demands

QST_Frac_Minor03_Note.flavor: Written in a strange shorthand, this odd journal contains a single legible paragraph: "Arek is insane if he thinks he can place bets with the business gold... We'll be in the infamous debtors prison of Menestad by sunrise! Did he think I wouldn't notice? It's time to cut ties."
QST_Frac_Minor03_Note.name: Samuel's Journal

QST_Frac_PaleKnightsKin_Journal_01.desc: Seems to be part of a series about the Knights Penitent. May be of interest to someone in Margrave.
QST_Frac_PaleKnightsKin_Journal_01.flavor: ...the Inquisitor finds that of our knights are lacking in devotion. That is except for Knight Coste, she goes above and beyond in her duties to the Cathedral. He noted with exuberance about how she had not seen her family in years...
QST_Frac_PaleKnightsKin_Journal_01.name: Archivist's Journal: Volume I

QST_Frac_PaleKnightsKin_Journal_02.desc: Seems to be part of a series about the Knights Penitent. May be of interest to someone in Margrave.
QST_Frac_PaleKnightsKin_Journal_02.flavor: ...regular teachings continue to struggle in light of the harsh realities of the world. How can one be tolerant in this environment? But the teachings are ever important as history shows us. If we are not unified, cooperating together, and tolerant of each other, we will not see many more sun rises...
QST_Frac_PaleKnightsKin_Journal_02.name: Archivist's Journal: Volume II

QST_Frac_PaleKnightsKin_Journal_03.desc: Seems to be part of a series about the Knights Penitent. May be of interest to someone in Margrave.
QST_Frac_PaleKnightsKin_Journal_03.flavor: ...it is through the teachings of the Cathedral of Light that we must ensure humanity's survival. Without it, people are prone to succumb to their baser instincts. We must ensure people are good...
QST_Frac_PaleKnightsKin_Journal_03.name: Archivist's Journal: Volume III

QST_Frac_Prologue_ChapelKey.flavor: A small, well-worn key, smeared with its owner's blood.
QST_Frac_Prologue_ChapelKey.name: Chapel Key

QST_Frac_Prologue_LorathsAmulet.flavor: An old amulet of unique design. It shows wear from years of use, perhaps as a badge of office.
QST_Frac_Prologue_LorathsAmulet.name: Strange Amulet

QST_Frac_Prologue_LorathsPolearm.flavor: While clearly old, its ornate blade has been kept sharpened and polished as though it would be needed again at any moment.
QST_Frac_Prologue_LorathsPolearm.name: Lorath's Polearm

QST_Frac_Prologue_TabletAnger.flavor: An aromatic and well-polished piece of cedar wood inscribed with the word "Anger".
QST_Frac_Prologue_TabletAnger.name: Holy Cedar Tablet

QST_Frac_Prologue_TabletCowardice.flavor: An aromatic and well-polished piece of cedar wood inscribed with the word "Fear".
QST_Frac_Prologue_TabletCowardice.name: Holy Cedar Tablet

QST_Frac_Prologue_TabletJealousy.flavor: An aromatic and well-polished piece of cedar wood inscribed with the word "Greed".
QST_Frac_Prologue_TabletJealousy.name: Holy Cedar Tablet

QST_Frac_Prologue_TabletNothing.flavor: An aromatic and well-polished piece of cedar wood inscribed with nothing but scribbles.
QST_Frac_Prologue_TabletNothing.name: Holy Cedar Tablet

QST_Frac_Prologue_TabletPride.flavor: An aromatic and well-polished piece of cedar wood inscribed with the word "Pride".
QST_Frac_Prologue_TabletPride.name: Holy Cedar Tablet

QST_Frac_SangChap_Book.flavor: The cursed chalice has a caked rich crimson lining the cup bowl.
QST_Frac_SangChap_Book.name: The Red Chalice

QST_Frac_SightMad_Eyeball_Necklace.flavor: This necklace contains a pair of eyeballs hooked into the small chain. While still wet to the touch, the pupils can also be observed dilating as if alive.
QST_Frac_SightMad_Eyeball_Necklace.name: Necklace of Eyes

QST_Frac_TaigaE_DropGift_Zalan01.desc: A faded painting of a small town
QST_Frac_TaigaE_DropGift_Zalan01.flavor: This old painting of Margrave's town square has seen better days.
QST_Frac_TaigaE_DropGift_Zalan01.name: Faded Old Painting

QST_Frac_TaigaE_DropGift_Zalan02.flavor: A traveling trader recorded their journeys and sales in this book.
QST_Frac_TaigaE_DropGift_Zalan02.name: Handwritten Book

QST_Frac_TaigaE_DropGift_Zalan03.desc: This wooden figurine has seen better days.
QST_Frac_TaigaE_DropGift_Zalan03.flavor: A weathered carving of a knight missing several pieces.
QST_Frac_TaigaE_DropGift_Zalan03.name: Carved Wooden Knight

QST_Frac_TaigaW_RareHarvest_Herbs_01.flavor: A stalk of small violet blooms gathered while harvesting other herbs.
QST_Frac_TaigaW_RareHarvest_Herbs_01.name: Frostbloom

QST_Frac_Vault_Spellbook.flavor: Bound in black leather, necromantic runes along the spine of the grim tome.
QST_Frac_Vault_Spellbook.name: Death Harnessed: Theories of Rathma

QST_Frac_Woodsman_Axe.flavor: The axe is still slick with blood that seems to soak through any cloth wrapping the blade.
QST_Frac_Woodsman_Axe.name: The Woodsman's Axe

QST_Hawe_APriceToPay_Venom.flavor: An acrid and extremely potent venom.
QST_Hawe_APriceToPay_Venom.name: Spider Venom

QST_Hawe_Act_Helm.flavor: Worn by a king, a usurper, a thief? A macabre trophy. A gift from the tree.
QST_Hawe_Act_Helm.name: Crown of Whispers

QST_Hawe_Arc_Reward.flavor: Upon pledging their life to serving the Tree of Whispers, witches of the swamp are gifted a root or branch to signify their accord.
QST_Hawe_Arc_Reward.name: Staff of Whispers

QST_Hawe_AtAnyCost_Candles.flavor: A handful of musty smelling, half-melted candles.
QST_Hawe_AtAnyCost_Candles.name: Half-Melted Candles

QST_Hawe_AtAnyCost_CorpseHead.flavor: The severed head of an Acolyte of Rathma. It speaks in a low moaning voice.
QST_Hawe_AtAnyCost_CorpseHead.name: Acolyte's Head

QST_Hawe_BadBlood_Potion.desc: A concoction of snakemen parts and blood magic. Ingesting it might turn one into a snakeman.
QST_Hawe_BadBlood_Potion.name: Gulyas' Potion

QST_Hawe_Bog_HeartsBurden_CorpseDrop.flavor: A worn dagger, spotted with rust and covered in blood.
QST_Hawe_Bog_HeartsBurden_CorpseDrop.name: Rusted Dagger

QST_Hawe_Bog_Kres_01_Plant.flavor: A bundle of puffball reeds, named for the tight bundles of cotton-like flowers.
QST_Hawe_Bog_Kres_01_Plant.name: Puffball Reed

QST_Hawe_Bog_Kres_02_TimueItem.flavor: A strange relic with unknown purpose. A small face is carved into a shard of bone, placed atop a gnarled root.
QST_Hawe_Bog_Kres_02_TimueItem.name: Stolen Idol

QST_Hawe_Bog_Kres_02_TimueSalve.flavor: Timue created this salve from marsh snake venom. She claimed it would allow Kres to "regain some of what he has lost."
QST_Hawe_Bog_Kres_02_TimueSalve.name: Timue's Salve

QST_Hawe_ByThree_Booze.flavor: A bottle of mead from Scosglen. This honey wine is combined with biteberry juice to provide a pleasing shade of crimson and a robust flavor.
QST_Hawe_ByThree_Booze.name: Cerrigar Red Sky

QST_Hawe_ByThree_PrayerBook.flavor: A well-loved collection of observations and thoughts. Many of the pages had been lost, but you have collected and re-added them where they belonged.
QST_Hawe_ByThree_PrayerBook.name: Symon's Tattered Journal

QST_Hawe_Coast_DropGift_Lyndon01.desc: PHThis symbol is embellished with gold.
QST_Hawe_Coast_DropGift_Lyndon01.flavor: [PH]A holy symbol made in the zakarum style, decorated heavily with gold leaf. Lyndon might be interested in this.
QST_Hawe_Coast_DropGift_Lyndon01.name: [PH]Garish Holy Symbol

QST_Hawe_Coast_DropGift_Lyndon02.flavor: [PH]An idol of Lilith, decorated heavily with silver filigree. Lyndon might be interested in this.
QST_Hawe_Coast_DropGift_Lyndon02.name: [PH]Filigreed Occult Fetish

QST_Hawe_Coast_DropGift_Lyndon03.desc: PHA crocodile faced idol with gem eyes.
QST_Hawe_Coast_DropGift_Lyndon03.flavor: [PH]An idol not often found in Hawezar. Lyndon might be interested in this.
QST_Hawe_Coast_DropGift_Lyndon03.name: [PH]Fanciful Bejewelled Idol

QST_Hawe_Coast_Lyndon_01_Item_Supplies.desc: A small crate filled with dried leaves.
QST_Hawe_Coast_Lyndon_01_Item_Supplies.flavor: A sharp, pungent scent surrounds the crate, stinging your nostrils.
QST_Hawe_Coast_Lyndon_01_Item_Supplies.name: "Supplies"

QST_Hawe_Coast_PoisonedHearts_AmuletRewa.flavor: "This simple necklace is emblazoned with the symbol of the Zakarum. However it has been scorched by flame to the point of being barely recognizable."
QST_Hawe_Coast_PoisonedHearts_AmuletRewa.name: Aneta's Keepsake

QST_Hawe_Crossway_RareHarvest_Ore.desc: PH A geode with several intact gems inside.
QST_Hawe_Crossway_RareHarvest_Ore.flavor: [PH] This is a rare, gem-laden geode. A local silversmith sells the necessary tools crack this open into several gems.
QST_Hawe_Crossway_RareHarvest_Ore.name: [PH] Western Hawezar Geode

QST_Hawe_Crossway_RareHarvest_OreKit.desc: PHA cloudy vial filled with acid flux.
QST_Hawe_Crossway_RareHarvest_OreKit.flavor: [PH] This will help with opening one rare Hawezar geode.
QST_Hawe_Crossway_RareHarvest_OreKit.name: [PH]Acid Flux

QST_Hawe_DarkPath_LockboxKey.flavor: A small worn key. It looks like it fits a chest or lockbox.
QST_Hawe_DarkPath_LockboxKey.name: Lockbox Key

QST_Hawe_DeadintheWater_Salvage.flavor: Various resources salvaged from the Forsaken Coast. They smell of rotting flesh.
QST_Hawe_DeadintheWater_Salvage.name: Salvaged Resources

QST_Hawe_Delta_EliasFinger.flavor: The preserved small finger from Elias' left hand. It emits a dark aura that sets you on edge.
QST_Hawe_Delta_EliasFinger.name: Elias' Mummified Finger

QST_Hawe_Delta_Zurke_01_Corpse.flavor: [PH] Sam the graverobber's corpse. It's not decayed yet. Don't ask how this man fits in your pocket.
QST_Hawe_Delta_Zurke_01_Corpse.name: [PH] Sam's Corpse

QST_Hawe_Delta_Zurke_02_Flesh.flavor: [PH] Collected from one of Zurke's experiments. It shows normal signs of decay.
QST_Hawe_Delta_Zurke_02_Flesh.name: [PH] Uncorrupted Flesh

QST_Hawe_Delta_Zurke_03_Fungus.flavor: [PH] The last item needed for Zurke's cure
QST_Hawe_Delta_Zurke_03_Fungus.name: [PH] Fungus

QST_Hawe_FaithInBlood_Reward.flavor: A well-loved book of litanies, prayers and psalms. Certain words are underlined, perhaps due to a deeply personal significance to those passages. The soft leather cover is strangely cold to the touch.
QST_Hawe_FaithInBlood_Reward.name: Sister Octavia's Prayer Book

QST_Hawe_GreaterGood_Supplies.desc: Bundles of food and clothes. Nothing looks overly valuable.
QST_Hawe_GreaterGood_Supplies.name: Backwater Supplies

QST_Hawe_Kres_02_Ingredient.flavor: A dark, thin fluid. An oily sheen catches the light.
QST_Hawe_Kres_02_Ingredient.name: Marsh Snake Venom

QST_Hawe_Kres_03_DismemberedRemains.flavor: A burlap sack filled with human remains, dried and shriveled. The lack of blood and viscera has created a desiccated, leathery corpse.
QST_Hawe_Kres_03_DismemberedRemains.name: Exsanguinated Remains

QST_Hawe_LostVillager01_Item_01.flavor: A variety of edible mushroom that grows in parts of Hawezar
QST_Hawe_LostVillager01_Item_01.name: Morel Mushroom

QST_Hawe_LostVillager01_Item_02.flavor: A variety of edible mushroom that grows in parts of Hawezar
QST_Hawe_LostVillager01_Item_02.name: Chanterelle Mushroom

QST_Hawe_LostVillager01_Item_03.flavor: A variety of edible mushroom that grows in parts of Hawezar
QST_Hawe_LostVillager01_Item_03.name: Chicken of the Woods Mushroom

QST_Hawe_M09_InvPage01.desc: A burned section of a larger book.
QST_Hawe_M09_InvPage01.flavor: A section of a larger tome, it is largely illegible due to smears of blood and ashes.
QST_Hawe_M09_InvPage01.name: Inquisitor's Ledger, Chapter 1

QST_Hawe_M09_InvPage02.desc: A burned section of a larger book.
QST_Hawe_M09_InvPage02.flavor: A section of a larger tome, it is largely illegible due to smears of blood and ashes.
QST_Hawe_M09_InvPage02.name: Inquisitor's Ledger, Chapter 2

QST_Hawe_M09_InvPage03.desc: A burned section of a larger book.
QST_Hawe_M09_InvPage03.flavor: A section of a larger tome, it is largely illegible due to smears of blood and ashes.
QST_Hawe_M09_InvPage03.name: Inquisitor's Ledger, Chapter 3

QST_Hawe_M09_InvPage04.desc: A burned section of a larger book.
QST_Hawe_M09_InvPage04.flavor: A section of a larger tome, it is largely illegible due to smears of blood and ashes.
QST_Hawe_M09_InvPage04.name: Inquisitor's Ledger, Chapter 4

QST_Hawe_Marsh_DropGift_Timue01.desc: PHThis is a curious item that Timue might be interested in.
QST_Hawe_Marsh_DropGift_Timue01.flavor: [PH]This is a curious item that Timue might be interested in.
QST_Hawe_Marsh_DropGift_Timue01.name: [PH]Budding Crimson Thorn

QST_Hawe_Marsh_DropGift_Timue02.flavor: [PH]A bit of fungus that is quite blighted. A curious item that Timue might be interested in.
QST_Hawe_Marsh_DropGift_Timue02.name: [PH]Blighted Fungus

QST_Hawe_Marsh_DropGift_Timue03.desc: PHThis venom is a strange color.
QST_Hawe_Marsh_DropGift_Timue03.flavor: [PH]Something is strange about this venom. A curious item that Timue might be interested in.
QST_Hawe_Marsh_DropGift_Timue03.name: [PH]Curious Venom

QST_Hawe_Marsh_Incense.flavor: A bundle of dried herbs. The strong, earthy scent sticks in the back of your throat and makes your head swim.
QST_Hawe_Marsh_Incense.name: Mystic Incense

QST_Hawe_Marsh_TempleLeftEye.flavor: A palm-sized red gemstone removed from the engraved stone door in Yngovani. It glows with a fiery light.
QST_Hawe_Marsh_TempleLeftEye.name: Serpent's Left Eye

QST_Hawe_Marsh_TempleRightEye.flavor: A palm-sized yellow gemstone removed from the engraved stone door in Yngovani. It glows with a sickly light.
QST_Hawe_Marsh_TempleRightEye.name: Serpent's Right Eye

QST_Hawe_NecroticResearch_Bones.desc: A pile of flesh and bone fragments from a snakeman necromancer minion.
QST_Hawe_NecroticResearch_Bones.name: Necrotic flesh

QST_Hawe_NecroticResearch_Venom.desc: A bottle of Nangari venom carefully extracted from dead snakemen.
QST_Hawe_NecroticResearch_Venom.name: Snake venom

QST_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_AnetasNecklace.flavor: "This simple necklace is emblazoned with the symbol of the Zakarum. It bears significant scorch marks."
QST_Hawe_PoisonedHearts_AnetasNecklace.name: Aneta's Keepsake

QST_Hawe_S04_Clue01_InvLetter.desc: A note written by Yonca's father, Kaan.
QST_Hawe_S04_Clue01_InvLetter.flavor: Written hastily and with many scribbled out sections, this shabby old note is hard to read.
QST_Hawe_S04_Clue01_InvLetter.name: Kaan's Note

QST_Hawe_S04_Clue02_InvMusicBox.desc: This bag is full of flimsy bits of metal.
QST_Hawe_S04_Clue02_InvMusicBox.flavor: A set of hand-engraved windchime sails made with obvious care but modest skill.
QST_Hawe_S04_Clue02_InvMusicBox.name: Windchime Sails

QST_Hawe_S04_Clue03_InvMusicCylinder.desc: A small bag full of little discs.
QST_Hawe_S04_Clue03_InvMusicCylinder.flavor: This bag contains a bunch of hand-carved windchime strikers.
QST_Hawe_S04_Clue03_InvMusicCylinder.name: Windchime Strikers

QST_Hawe_S05_AldaraJournal.flavor: Aldara's journal is mostly a tally of names and payments.
QST_Hawe_S05_AldaraJournal.name: Aldara's Journal

QST_Hawe_S05_BrechtJournal.flavor: A scorched journal found on a corpse.
QST_Hawe_S05_BrechtJournal.name: Brecht's Journal

QST_Hawe_S05_ItemAmulet.flavor: This amulet looks oddly discolored and feels almost feverish to the touch.
QST_Hawe_S05_ItemAmulet.name: Aldara's Amulet

QST_Hawe_Soulrot_Eyeballs.flavor: The plucked eyeballs are wet as thick mucus coats the parts newly exposed.
QST_Hawe_Soulrot_Eyeballs.name: Oversized Snake Eyes

QST_Hawe_Soulrot_Fungus.flavor: The fungus glows a strange green and offers a pungent odor long after being harvested.
QST_Hawe_Soulrot_Fungus.name: Gano Fungus

QST_Hawe_Soulrot_Head.flavor: The head was severed a week ago, but the flesh is largely intact.
QST_Hawe_Soulrot_Head.name: Grotesque Head

QST_Hawe_Soulrot_Medicine.flavor: Medicine brewed with Gano Fungus. It has an earthy smell.
QST_Hawe_Soulrot_Medicine.name: Gano Fungus Medicine

QST_Hawe_Soulrot_MoldHeart.flavor: The mold-covered heart slowly pulses, sending a small puff into the air.
QST_Hawe_Soulrot_MoldHeart.name: Moldy Heart

QST_Hawe_SwampsProtection_Package.desc: A bag of medicine and food Timue made to ease the suffering of the infected.
QST_Hawe_SwampsProtection_Package.name: Timue's Supplies

QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Flower01.flavor: The petals of this flower are blackened as if left too near a great heat.
QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Flower01.name: Singed Daisy

QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Flower02.flavor: The stem droops under the weight of the sickly flowers. This plant would not have lasted long even before you picked it.
QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Flower02.name: Withered Delphinium

QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Flower03.flavor: The petals fall from the flower the moment you touch it.
QST_Hawe_TheHeretic_Flower03.name: Dying Rose

QST_Hawe_Verge3_Spell_Material.flavor: The vial glows with a penetrating white light.
QST_Hawe_Verge3_Spell_Material.name: Vial of Purified Quicksilver

QST_Hawe_Verge5_Lotus.flavor: The Yellow Lotus leaves are covered in a sticky clear film.
QST_Hawe_Verge5_Lotus.name: Yellow Lotus

QST_Hawe_Verge5_Maggot_Ichor.flavor: A foul corrosive ichor that can cause skin to itch and wither over a short time.
QST_Hawe_Verge5_Maggot_Ichor.name: Maggot Queen Ichor

QST_Hawe_Verge_Taissa_01_Item_RitualSupp.desc: PHA collection of herbs for Taissa, to help with her pain.
QST_Hawe_Verge_Taissa_01_Item_RitualSupp.flavor: [PH]A collection of herbs for Taissa, to help with her pain.
QST_Hawe_Verge_Taissa_01_Item_RitualSupp.name: Medicinal Herbs

QST_Hawe_Verge_Taissa_02_Item_SkeletonKe.desc: PH A key that grant entry to the Ritual Site at the Tree of whispers
QST_Hawe_Verge_Taissa_02_Item_SkeletonKe.flavor: PH A key that grant entry to the Ritual Site at the Tree of whispers
QST_Hawe_Verge_Taissa_02_Item_SkeletonKe.name: Skeleton Key

QST_Hawe_Verge_Taissa_02_SnakeBones.flavor: Eyes from the Nangari Oracles that live near the Tree of Whispers
QST_Hawe_Verge_Taissa_02_SnakeBones.name: [PH] Snake Eye

QST_Hawe_Vyeresz_FetchMinor_02_Trinkets.flavor: [PH] Each crusader is granted an amulet on initiation.
QST_Hawe_Vyeresz_FetchMinor_02_Trinkets.name: [PH] Zakarum Amulet

QST_Hawe_Wetlands_FailedCrusader_01_Joha.flavor: An expertly crafted suit of armor. It hums with divine energy.
QST_Hawe_Wetlands_FailedCrusader_01_Joha.name: Johanna's Armor

QST_Hawe_ZakFort_Carthas_CarthasNote.desc: Written by Carthas, paladin of the Zakarum. His letters are bold and deliberate.
QST_Hawe_ZakFort_Carthas_CarthasNote.flavor:
(PH) I was there when Sankekur fell. I felt Mephisto's magic clawing at my mind. Even today, when I remember that moment, I am unsure if the anger I feel comes from him or me. But that does not hinder my faith.
Remember, brothers and sisters, the Light won that day. We rallied. We defeated a prime evil. And what's more, we did it together. The Darkness will never extinguish the Light. It is our duty to ensure that.
The day we discovered the corruption within our faith was the day we began anew. It was the day I knew I was truly fighting for the Light.
QST_Hawe_ZakFort_Carthas_CarthasNote.name: Unsent Letter

QST_Hawe_ZakFort_SealedQuarters_Mehphist.flavor: Collect the manifestation of Mephisto's hatred to aid Ksenia's ritual.
QST_Hawe_ZakFort_SealedQuarters_Mehphist.name: Mephisto's Corruption

QST_Hawe_ZakFort_SealedQuarters_Mehphist.flavor: A churning mass of hatred. It tugs at your mind, filling your thoughts with violence and treachery.
QST_Hawe_ZakFort_SealedQuarters_Mehphist.name: Mephisto's Corruption

QST_Hawe_ZakFort_SealedQuarters_Mehphist.flavor: A churning mass of hatred. It tugs at your mind, filling your thoughts with violence and treachery.
QST_Hawe_ZakFort_SealedQuarters_Mehphist.name: Mephisto's Corruption

QST_Hawe_ZakFort_SealedQuarters_Mehphist.flavor: A churning mass of hatred. It tugs at your mind, filling your thoughts with violence and treachery.
QST_Hawe_ZakFort_SealedQuarters_Mehphist.name: Mephisto's Corruption

QST_Hawe_ZakFort_SealedQuarters_Motes_Me.flavor: Collect the manifestation of Mephisto's hatred to aid Ksenia's ritual.
QST_Hawe_ZakFort_SealedQuarters_Motes_Me.name: Mephisto's Corruption

QST_Hell_Act_Chest.flavor: Terror begets Hate and Hate begets Destruction, Destruction begets Terror..
QST_Hell_Act_Chest.name: Cuirass of the Prime Evils

QST_ITM_Step_HubrisSmilesBack_JawOfferin.flavor: An ornamented jawbone offering. The sound of distant laughter seems to emanate from the bone itself.
QST_ITM_Step_HubrisSmilesBack_JawOfferin.name: Baneful Oblation

QST_ITM_Step_RaisingSpears_CraneSpear.desc: PH Ancient spear once used by Crane Tribe's greatest warriors.
QST_ITM_Step_RaisingSpears_CraneSpear.flavor: [PH] A weathered spear that has seen countless battles, bearing scars of both success and failure.
QST_ITM_Step_RaisingSpears_CraneSpear.name: Blood-Etched Spear

QST_Jeweler_Gem.desc: A precious stone, taken from the jeweler of Ked Bardu
QST_Jeweler_Gem.name: Tungal's Gem

QST_KV_VampireRemains.desc: A blood-soaked heart is all that remains of a vampire bound eternally to its partner. It is long cold, but still beats.
QST_KV_VampireRemains.name: Remains of a Bound Vampire

QST_Kehj_Armor_01_AlimArmor.flavor: The armor set of Alim, a fallen Iron Wolf. Three distinct puncture wounds tell of the soldier's final moments.
QST_Kehj_Armor_01_AlimArmor.name: Battered Iron Wolf Armor

QST_Kehj_Armor_01_TalaArmor.flavor: The armor set of Tala, a fallen Iron Wolf. Fresh crimson stains tell of the soldier's final moments.
QST_Kehj_Armor_01_TalaArmor.name: Bloody Iron Wolf Armor

QST_Kehj_Caldeum_DropGift_Barez01.flavor: A sword taken as a trophy by a Triune cultist. Barez will want to see it.
QST_Kehj_Caldeum_DropGift_Barez01.name: Iron Wolf Sword

QST_Kehj_Caldeum_DropGift_Barez02.desc: This armor has survived many battles.
QST_Kehj_Caldeum_DropGift_Barez02.flavor: Though scratched and dented, Barez may want to see this Iron Wolf gear.
QST_Kehj_Caldeum_DropGift_Barez02.name: Iron Wolf Armor

QST_Kehj_FinalStraw_BagofOats.flavor: These fresh oats would be a tempting delicacy for a hungry camel.
QST_Kehj_FinalStraw_BagofOats.name: Bag of Oats

QST_Kehj_FinalStraw_Water.flavor: [PH] This is the last drops of the old well.
QST_Kehj_FinalStraw_Water.name: [PH] Water

QST_Kehj_GeaKul_FetchMinor_06_Trinkets.flavor: Scent Glands harvested from Khazra. They have a pungent, musky odor.
QST_Kehj_GeaKul_FetchMinor_06_Trinkets.name: Khazra Glands

QST_Kehj_GeaKul_FetchMinor_07_Journal.flavor: [PH] This worn journal was dropped from a treasure goblin. Much of the handwritten scribbles are illegible, but there are some notes trying to make sense of goblins' movements. There is a name on the inside cover - Ostaf.
QST_Kehj_GeaKul_FetchMinor_07_Journal.name: [PH] Old Journal

QST_Kehj_HighDesert_ZakFetch_ThiefNote.desc: A note written in scratchy handwriting. A hastily drawn image, resembling the Zakarum artifact, is drawn in the corner.
QST_Kehj_HighDesert_ZakFetch_ThiefNote.flavor:
Gavon
Here's what you're after. It better be in good condition this time. Ihsan doesn't like scratches.
QST_Kehj_HighDesert_ZakFetch_ThiefNote.name: Handwritten Note

QST_Kehj_HighDesert_ZakarumItem.flavor: An artifact precious to the Zakarum faith, now broken. The precious metals and jewels have been torn away, leaving behind splintered wood and a dull metal frame.
QST_Kehj_HighDesert_ZakarumItem.name: Broken Zakarum Artifact

QST_Kehj_HighDesert_ZakarumItem2.flavor: The stolen Zakarum artifact. Recovered from a notorious tomb raider, there is a slight red tint from his blood.
QST_Kehj_HighDesert_ZakarumItem2.name: Zakarum Holy Symbol

QST_Kehj_Infection_01_CurePlant.flavor: The small, fragile flower of a kehjistan palm tree. Despite its beautiful colors, it has a pungent aroma like rotting flesh.
QST_Kehj_Infection_01_CurePlant.name: Ghost Palm Flower

QST_Kehj_Item_PayDue_LockBox.flavor: A key-locked box, still heavy with coin. Judging by the tool marks, someone tried to pry it open.
QST_Kehj_Item_PayDue_LockBox.name: Miners' Lockbox

QST_Kehj_KIA_IronWolvesArmor.flavor: The armor set of a fallen Iron Wolf. Three distinct puncture wounds tell of the soldier's final moments.
QST_Kehj_KIA_IronWolvesArmor.name: Battered Iron Wolf Armor

QST_Kehj_LadyOasis_Conduit.flavor: [PH] An old, metal conduit. For it's age, surprisingly it has no rust.
QST_Kehj_LadyOasis_Conduit.name: [PH] Conduit

QST_Kehj_LadyOasis_IzelGem.flavor: [PH] This stone in which Izel resides radiates warmth. It seems to pulsate.
QST_Kehj_LadyOasis_IzelGem.name: [PH] Izel

QST_Kehj_LonelyWolf_02_BanditNote.flavor:
[PH] Be patient. Poison takes time, but the Iron Wolves will succumb.

Do not do anything to draw attention. If they learn of us before we are ready, I will force you to drink your own brew.

--Ihsan
QST_Kehj_LonelyWolf_02_BanditNote.name: Crumpled Orders

QST_Kehj_LowDesert_DropGift_Baraim01.desc: A plain crate labeled with Baraim's name
QST_Kehj_LowDesert_DropGift_Baraim01.flavor: A lost shipment originally destined for Baraim, the Gea Kul innkeeper.
QST_Kehj_LowDesert_DropGift_Baraim01.name: Battered Crate

QST_Kehj_LowDesert_RareHarvest_Herb.desc: A mushroom found growing near herbs.
QST_Kehj_LowDesert_RareHarvest_Herb.flavor: An unusual mushroom picked while harvesting herbs in Kehjistan.
QST_Kehj_LowDesert_RareHarvest_Herb.name: Spotted Mushroom

QST_Kehj_Oasis_DropGift_Baraim02.desc: This letter is stained with salt and smeared ink.
QST_Kehj_Oasis_DropGift_Baraim02.flavor: A letter that has been handled carelessly, addressed to Baraim.
QST_Kehj_Oasis_DropGift_Baraim02.name: Waterstained Letter

QST_Kehj_Oasis_FetchMinor_02_Seaweed.flavor: [PH] Seaweed that's been digesting inside the Drowned. The smell is nauseating.
QST_Kehj_Oasis_FetchMinor_02_Seaweed.name: Digested Seaweed

QST_Kehj_Oasis_Note_GeaKulNote.flavor: PH:  Our spiders have caught threads of an escape by some of our debtors. Ensure they do not make it to Dahlgur. Bring us their faces so that we may show the cost of avoiding your debts.
QST_Kehj_Oasis_Note_GeaKulNote.name: Gea Kul Orders

QST_Kehj_Oasis_RareHarvest_Ore.desc: A dull metallic chunk of rock.
QST_Kehj_Oasis_RareHarvest_Ore.flavor: An unexpected type of ore found while mining in Kehjistan.
QST_Kehj_Oasis_RareHarvest_Ore.name: Unusual Ore

QST_Kehj_Penitent_02_Item.flavor: The Knights Penitent use these for identifying informants and other civilian allies.
QST_Kehj_Penitent_02_Item.name: Inquisitor's Insignia

QST_Kehj_Penitent_Fish.desc: A wrapped package containing enough fish to feed several people for a few days.
QST_Kehj_Penitent_Fish.flavor: A fragrant bouquet of the ocean's riches.
QST_Kehj_Penitent_Fish.name: Parcel of fish

QST_Kehj_PinchofPoison_ScorpionGlands.flavor: Venom is injected through the massive stinger at the tip. These must be handled carefully.
QST_Kehj_PinchofPoison_ScorpionGlands.name: Scorpion Venom Glands

QST_Kehj_Remnants_Note.flavor:
Jazem, 
Knights have invaded the city and they found the Zakarum records. They think the church members are heretics. We need to get out of here. I will be waiting by the bazaar. Be careful. 
Yours, Hader
QST_Kehj_Remnants_Note.name: Crumpled Note

QST_Kehj_TracesofIron_HealingItem.flavor: The amulet bears decades of small nicks and scratches. It was well loved.
QST_Kehj_TracesofIron_HealingItem.name: Jilan's Family Heirloom

QST_Kehj_TriuneRitual_BaalGem.flavor: [PH] Found in Altar of Ruin. This buzzing gem is hot to the touch. The Triune Cult may have used this for nefarious purposes, but those secrets are unknown.
QST_Kehj_TriuneRitual_BaalGem.name: Bala's Stone of Creation

QST_Kehj_TriuneRitual_DiabloGem.flavor: [PH] Found in Sepulcher of the Forsworn This buzzing gem is hot to the touch. The Triune Cult may have used this for nefarious purposes, but those secrets are unknown.
QST_Kehj_TriuneRitual_DiabloGem.name: Dialon's Stone of Determination

QST_Kehj_TriuneRitual_MephistoGem.flavor: [PH] Found in Fields of Hatred Town. This buzzing gem is hot to the touch. The Triune Cult may have used this for nefarious purposes, but those secrets are unknown.
QST_Kehj_TriuneRitual_MephistoGem.name: Mefis' Stone of Love

QST_Lorebook_ScosLegacies_Deed.desc: An aging deed showing a family tree of Garan.
QST_Lorebook_ScosLegacies_Deed.flavor: This deed contains the details of the family lineage of the Garan line.
QST_Lorebook_ScosLegacies_Deed.name: Garan Deed

QST_Orbei_LowerMonasteryKey.desc: A key to the next level of the Monastery
QST_Orbei_LowerMonasteryKey.flavor: Well worn, brass key. Simple, without ornaments.
QST_Orbei_LowerMonasteryKey.name: Orbei Monastery Third Level Key

QST_Prologue_Act_Boots.flavor: Wearer be blessed. Keep steady feet and a true heart.
QST_Prologue_Act_Boots.name: Intrepid Reckoning

QST_RogueInnerSight_Lorebook_BakiraNote.desc: Written by the Rogue Bakira as she died.
QST_RogueInnerSight_Lorebook_BakiraNote.flavor: Leyrana, I'm sorry to do this to you. But I have at least partially succeeded in my quest. Search my corpse when you find me and take this seeing stone back to our Order. Try not to be too disappointed in me, the eagerness to see the end of this journey clouded my vision. Know that I weep for my dead colleagues. Live well, and die fulfilled sister.
QST_RogueInnerSight_Lorebook_BakiraNote.name: Hastily Written Note

QST_Scos_ASoddenPact_SoddenClump.flavor: [PH] A unsettling mass of sodden black hair. It seems to slowly writhe when held, as if alive.
QST_Scos_ASoddenPact_SoddenClump.name: Clump of Sodden Hair

QST_Scos_BrinyFate_BenenLetter.desc: A sealed letter to Fergus found in a crew strongbox at Eternal Watch
QST_Scos_BrinyFate_BenenLetter.flavor: A letter written to Fergus from Benen, telling him that he departed for distant shores to leave him behind. Benen speaks of the reality of their poor relationship.
QST_Scos_BrinyFate_BenenLetter.name: Rolled Letter

QST_Scos_CeremonialDagger.desc: An old, dull dagger, etches with druidic runes.
QST_Scos_CeremonialDagger.name: Ceremonial Dagger

QST_Scos_CeremonialHorn.desc: The hallowed out horn of a ram, covered with intricate carvings.
QST_Scos_CeremonialHorn.name: Ceremonial Horn

QST_Scos_Crone_Q1_BearHeart.desc: An unnaturally large bear heart. It gives off a strong smell of decay.
QST_Scos_Crone_Q1_BearHeart.name: Barret's corrupted heart

QST_Scos_Crone_Q2_RitualTome.desc: An ancient druid scroll containing the instructions for a ritual.
QST_Scos_Crone_Q2_RitualTome.name: Dusty Druid Scroll

QST_Scos_Downs_DropGift_Artair01.desc: PHA beastly carving that is broken.
QST_Scos_Downs_DropGift_Artair01.flavor: [PH]A broken carving of what looks like part of a large beast, specifically the clawed limbs.
QST_Scos_Downs_DropGift_Artair01.name: [PH]Broken Carving

QST_Scos_Downs_DropGift_Artair02.desc: PHA druid totem carving that is broken.
QST_Scos_Downs_DropGift_Artair02.flavor: [PH]A broken druid totem that looks like part of a large beast, specifically the body.
QST_Scos_Downs_DropGift_Artair02.name: [PH]Broken Totem

QST_Scos_Downs_DropGift_Artair03.flavor: [PH]This carving of a bear's head is part of a larger totem used by druids when learning shapeshifting.
QST_Scos_Downs_DropGift_Artair03.name: [PH]Broken Bear Totem

QST_Scos_Druid_CQuest_Stag_Skull.flavor: This stag skull is covered in gore and feels unnaturally heavy.
QST_Scos_Druid_CQuest_Stag_Skull.name: Stag Skull

QST_Scos_DunnsLetter.flavor: My dear pupil Shea, I'm sorry that I must refuse assisting you with this summon. These are forces that neither of us should be meddling with. I hope that you will come to understand this as I do, and return to Balagar soon to continue your lessons. Your master and mentor, Dunn.
QST_Scos_DunnsLetter.name: Letter from Dunn

QST_Scos_Estate_Braega_Book_Item.desc: A volume of the comprehensive history of Scoglen authored by Braega
QST_Scos_Estate_Braega_Book_Item.name: A History of Scosglen

QST_Scos_FeralMoon_MagicItem.desc: An amulet blessed by the Cathedral to ward off evil.
QST_Scos_FeralMoon_MagicItem.flavor: "Wherever the Faithful walk, they bring the Light of Inarius to protect against the darkness."
QST_Scos_FeralMoon_MagicItem.name: Light Blessed Amulet

QST_Scos_FieldsofRuin_GoatmanHead.flavor: The decapitated head of a Goatman chieftain
QST_Scos_FieldsofRuin_GoatmanHead.name: Goatman head

QST_Scos_Hills_WeepingCairns_AiridahJour.desc: A letter from Airidah discussing the druid killings
QST_Scos_Hills_WeepingCairns_AiridahJour.flavor:
[PH] Airidah details the sorrow she carries burying her kin in secret and silence.
So many times she wanted to lash out against the Knights, but she held her hand to prevent further violence.
Donan said he would see it stopped, but some Knights still see to bloodshed.
This is the price of trusting the Cathedral in Scosglen. Many Knights Penitent see the druids as tainted folk harnessing profane magics. 
Even Donan…
QST_Scos_Hills_WeepingCairns_AiridahJour.name: Writings of Airidah's Silence

QST_Scos_Hills_WeepingCairns_AiridahJour.desc: A letter from Airidah discussing her silent grief
QST_Scos_Hills_WeepingCairns_AiridahJour.flavor:
[PH] Airidah is beside herself after burying so many brothers and sisters. 
Those she mentored, and who mentored her in kind, buried. Forgotten.
Walking these halls, she feels the weight of their anger. It is excruciating. 
The dead can only remain unanswered for so long…
QST_Scos_Hills_WeepingCairns_AiridahJour.name: Writings of Airidah's Grief

QST_Scos_Item_DaughterOak.flavor: A clean cutting from the roots of the Great Oak. You can almost feel it move in your hand.
QST_Scos_Item_DaughterOak.name: Root Cutting

QST_Scos_KaylasDagger.desc: An old dagger with some etchings on the side.
QST_Scos_KaylasDagger.name: Kayla's Dagger

QST_Scos_LochRaeth_BottledHeirloom.desc: A family heirloom found with a letter in a bottle on the shores of the Jagged Shoals
QST_Scos_LochRaeth_BottledHeirloom.name: Heirloom from Bottle

QST_Scos_LochRaeth_BottledLetter.desc: A letter found in a bottle on the shores of the Jagged Shoals
QST_Scos_LochRaeth_BottledLetter.flavor:
Padrig,

I know this may never reach you, but I couldn't live with myself if I didn't try. I've been forced into exile and will likely never see you or your mother again. I know things are hard right now, but one day, the Chieftain will pay for their lies.

Enclosed is a special amulet passed down from my father. Stay strong, and know that I am and always will be proud of you. No distance could ever change that.

Take care of your mum,
Dad
QST_Scos_LochRaeth_BottledLetter.name: Letter from Bottle

QST_Scos_OldWays_Artifact.desc: A genuine archaeological artifact made of some kind of rock
QST_Scos_OldWays_Artifact.flavor: This strange rock is inscribed with curious glyphs in language long forgotten.
QST_Scos_OldWays_Artifact.name: Ancient Artifact

QST_Scos_SignoftheTimes_GooseSign.desc: An weatherworn wooden sign displaying the famously rotund goose of the Highland tavern.
QST_Scos_SignoftheTimes_GooseSign.flavor: A welcome sight to weary souls venturing through Scosglen, Under the Fat Goose Inn provides warmth when all else is extinguished.
QST_Scos_SignoftheTimes_GooseSign.name: Sign for Under the Fat Goose Inn

QST_Scos_SignoftheTimes_ListofLastDeeds.desc: A clumsily written note that outlines the deeds Tavish wished to accomplish before his passing.
QST_Scos_SignoftheTimes_ListofLastDeeds.flavor:
Tavish's List of Last Deeds
- Nick the sign from Under the Fat Goose.
- Stare down the gateway statue of Maddux Watch.
- Climb the old crane atop the waterfall in Old Heimberg
- Claim and cozy up in a Highland bear's den.
QST_Scos_SignoftheTimes_ListofLastDeeds.name: Tavish's List of Last Deeds

QST_Scos_SignoftheTimes_TavishDaggers.desc: A set of old, dull daggers.
QST_Scos_SignoftheTimes_TavishDaggers.flavor: Nairne used to play tavern games of courage with Tavish with these daggers. A piece of blood-stained cloth from Tavish's remains is tightly tied around each of the hilts. A last memento to a departed friend.
QST_Scos_SignoftheTimes_TavishDaggers.name: Mementos to Tavish

QST_Scos_TendingNature_Bark.desc: Moss covered bark from a mature woodwraith.
QST_Scos_TendingNature_Bark.name: Woodwraith Bark

QST_Scos_TendingNature_Essense.desc: The distilled matter of a ghost now twice dead.
QST_Scos_TendingNature_Essense.name: Spectral essence

QST_Scos_TendingNature_Herb.desc: The gangly root of a bitterleaf plant often used in remedies. The leaves are toxic to most creatures.
QST_Scos_TendingNature_Herb.name: Bitterleaf Root

QST_Scos_TheDiviner_RuneStone.flavor: A stone that is part of a collection used to focus and draw from ley energy in the region.
QST_Scos_TheDiviner_RuneStone.name: Runestone of Tur Dulra

QST_Scos_TravelingScholar_Statue.desc: A small, stone statue carved in the likeness of some animal.
QST_Scos_TravelingScholar_Statue.name: Worn Carving

QST_Scos_UnholyBloodlines_GoatmanBlood.flavor: Fresh blood from a dead Khazra
QST_Scos_UnholyBloodlines_GoatmanBlood.name: Vial of Khazra Blood

QST_Scos_UnholyBloodlines_Totem.flavor: A small, stone statue carved into the likeness of a wolf.  "To become the wolf is to become the hunter, fierce and free.  To return to mundanity thereafter is the real trial."
QST_Scos_UnholyBloodlines_Totem.name: Druid Totem

QST_Scos_UnholyBloodlines_WolfBlood.flavor: Blood from a cursed werewolf.  It is a dark, sickly color.
QST_Scos_UnholyBloodlines_WolfBlood.name: Vial of Werewolf Blood

QST_Scos_VotivePassing_HandmadeTorc.flavor: This is a well made torc, with the name "Maisie" inscribed on the inside.
QST_Scos_VotivePassing_HandmadeTorc.name: Handmade Torc

QST_Step_AbahruRift_MerchantLetter.desc: A bloodied letter from a slain merchant
QST_Step_AbahruRift_MerchantLetter.flavor: Thank you for helping Cousin Genbar. Times are hard for his stone-carving, but he is too stubborn to move his family and too proud to take charity. Give him a deal and I will pay the difference.
QST_Step_AbahruRift_MerchantLetter.name: Merchant's Letter

QST_Step_Act_Pants.flavor: Resplendent regalia tainted with the power of the corrupt.
QST_Step_Act_Pants.name: Breeches of the Primus

QST_Step_BloodAndSweat_doll_item.flavor: A worn and well-loved doll.  The word 'Tuya' is carved into it.
QST_Step_BloodAndSweat_doll_item.name: Crude Doll

QST_Step_CentralCanyon_RareHarvest_Ore.flavor: A small, unusual piece of ore found while mining in the Dry Steppes.
QST_Step_CentralCanyon_RareHarvest_Ore.name: Strange Ore Sample

QST_Step_Coast_DropGift_PriestErol01.desc: A battered book that has seen better days.
QST_Step_Coast_DropGift_PriestErol01.flavor: A well worn book of Zakarum prayers and hymns. Show this to a priest.
QST_Step_Coast_DropGift_PriestErol01.name: Old Zakarum Prayerbook

QST_Step_DemonLedger_DebtBook.flavor:
A leather bound ledger that is singed on the edges. Inside are many signed contracts, most of which have been scorched from the pages.

Signed: Andreea of Lakren's Overlook
QST_Step_DemonLedger_DebtBook.name: Scorched Debt Ledger

QST_Step_DemonLedger_DebtBook_A.flavor:
A leather bound ledger that is singed on the edges. Inside are many signed contracts, most of which have been scorched from the pages.

Signed: Lyruk of Ked Bardu
QST_Step_DemonLedger_DebtBook_A.name: Scorched Debt Ledger

QST_Step_ExhumingFaith_Note_item.flavor: From the stern of the great wreck, walk towards the Light.  Where the ever-faithful watcher guards his master's possessions, turn dextral.  Twenty paces to the lone tree grasping towards the dying light.  Its reaching fingers point to the monument of the sinners' folly where you will find our resting place.
QST_Step_ExhumingFaith_Note_item.name: Treasure Map

QST_Step_FateRetreat_FetchMinor_07_Box.flavor: [PH] A mysterious relic of unknown origin and use. It is currently broken.
QST_Step_FateRetreat_FetchMinor_07_Box.name: [PH] Mysterious Relic

QST_Step_FiendSoFamiliar_Reward_Curio.desc: A focus to channel demonic essence into powerful enhancing energies gifted to you by Rakhaan, a strange demon who wishes to co-exist.
QST_Step_FiendSoFamiliar_Reward_Curio.name: Rakhaan's Favor

QST_Step_ForgingTheMaul_Ore.flavor: An extremely hard mineral used by the Oxen tribe blacksmiths
QST_Step_ForgingTheMaul_Ore.name: Silver Fawxite

QST_Step_Grassland_RareHarvest_Herb.flavor: A bright yellow flower found while harvesting herbs in the Dry Steppes.
QST_Step_Grassland_RareHarvest_Herb.name: Dust Daisy

QST_Step_Guulrahn02_Prison_Lorebook.flavor: A small journal stained with blood.
QST_Step_Guulrahn02_Prison_Lorebook.name: Battered Journal

QST_Step_HungerforaNewLife_Proof.desc: Scraps of paper evidently used as a makeshift journal by Oyuun during her captivity.
QST_Step_HungerforaNewLife_Proof.flavor: "... but the hunger is growing like a fire inside me. Though all they offer us is human flesh, I fear soon this hunger will overtake me, and I will have no choice but to give in ..."
QST_Step_HungerforaNewLife_Proof.name: Oyuun's "Proof"

QST_Step_NameofLove_Cleaver.desc: Side Quest: In the Name of Love
QST_Step_NameofLove_Cleaver.name: [PH] Cleaver of Undying Love

QST_Step_Onyx_FetchMinor_02.flavor: [PH] Personal effects of the undead. Notes, jewelry, etc
QST_Step_Onyx_FetchMinor_02.name: Personal Effects

QST_Step_Orbei_AbbotLetter_01.desc: A sealed parchment from the Abbot
QST_Step_Orbei_AbbotLetter_01.flavor: Lorath Nahr, how bizarre it is to hear from you. Your charming apprentice arrived just this morning with equally disturbing news, but he made no mention of you. Am I to assume you did not send him? Please join us at Orbei as soon as you are able.
QST_Step_Orbei_AbbotLetter_01.name: Message from the Abbot

QST_Step_Orbei_EliasLetter.flavor: The whole of human knowledge shall be shared among the children of Lilith, and no secret shall be kept from them. And the liars and learned thieves of the world shall perish in their regret.
QST_Step_Orbei_EliasLetter.name: Book of Lilith

QST_Step_Orbei_ScholarsJournal.desc: A blood-stained journal bearing the Zakarum crest
QST_Step_Orbei_ScholarsJournal.flavor: I was so excited when I walked into the Sacristy that day. Finally, my turn to speak the words and enter the Archive. Now I'd give anything to forget what I've learned. I don't think I'll ever sleep again.
QST_Step_Orbei_ScholarsJournal.name: Scholar's Journal

QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_GibbetKey.flavor: An old brass key, worn from years of use.
QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_GibbetKey.name: Gibbet Key

QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_Reward.flavor: The last holdout of the Onyx Watchtower, Borza the Grim inspired great fear and great respect among his crew. Even given a second chance at freedom, his underlings would always come crawling back.
QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_Reward.name: Borza's Bonecrusher

QST_Step_QaraYisu_FetchMinor_04_Bones.flavor: [PH] These bones are told to wards off curses and evil spirits. Whether true or not, it will ease some anxious souls.
QST_Step_QaraYisu_FetchMinor_04_Bones.name: Khazra Bones

QST_Step_SaltBegetsSalt_GoatBody.desc: The lifeless body of Jargal's beloved goat, Tuji
QST_Step_SaltBegetsSalt_GoatBody.flavor: Eye's glazed white, salt covers the goat's muzzle
QST_Step_SaltBegetsSalt_GoatBody.name: Tuji's Body

QST_Step_ScholarsDilem_Ancient_Blade.flavor: The blade has been broken right where the blade forms above the hilt.
QST_Step_ScholarsDilem_Ancient_Blade.name: Broken Ancient Blade

QST_Step_ScholarsDilem_Ancient_Blade_Rew.flavor: The ancient blade has now been reformed by means unknown. The Shaman used this blade to take his own life for his failure to conjure the rains, and even the sight of it upsets them still.
QST_Step_ScholarsDilem_Ancient_Blade_Rew.name: Restored Ancient Blade

QST_Step_Sooth_DropGift_Gesur02.desc: A pouch filled with worn old coins.
QST_Step_Sooth_DropGift_Gesur02.flavor: The coins in this bag come from a variety of different cities.
QST_Step_Sooth_DropGift_Gesur02.name: Bag of Old Coins

QST_Step_South_DropGift_Gesur01.flavor: This amulet's prayer of protection didn't help the traveler who owned it.
QST_Step_South_DropGift_Gesur01.name: Tarnished Amulet

QST_Step_WeightofSin_Bracelet01.desc: A hand-carved bracelet tarnished by ash
QST_Step_WeightofSin_Bracelet01.flavor: Eagle wings span the underside of the bangle
QST_Step_WeightofSin_Bracelet01.name: Carved Bracelet

QST_Step_WesternFlat_DropGift_PriestErol.desc: This old medallion is scratched and tarnished.
QST_Step_WesternFlat_DropGift_PriestErol.flavor: A religious medallion with symbols of the Zakarum faith.
QST_Step_WesternFlat_DropGift_PriestErol.name: Zakarum Medallion

QST_Step_WhatRemains_remains.flavor: The grisly remains of a cannibal victim.
QST_Step_WhatRemains_remains.name: Erdene's Remains

QST_Step_WorthyOfArreat_sword_item.desc: A well made weapon fit for a warrior. Despite its age, the weapon is sharp and free of rust.
QST_Step_WorthyOfArreat_sword_item.name: Ancient Weapon

QST_Steps_ForgingTheMaul_DemonHorn.flavor: Torn from a servant of Hell the horn reeks of evil
QST_Steps_ForgingTheMaul_DemonHorn.name: Demon Horn

QST_Steps_ForgingtheMaul_BrokenMaul.desc: The Great Maul broken into pieces
QST_Steps_ForgingtheMaul_BrokenMaul.flavor: The Ancestral weapon of the Oxen Tribe now damaged and in pieces.
QST_Steps_ForgingtheMaul_BrokenMaul.name: Broken Maul

QST_Volcano_FaithSoul.desc: The Soul of a once faithful man corrupted by Hatred
QST_Volcano_FaithSoul.flavor: From the exterior, you'd never know who's soul this was or what their life was like.
QST_Volcano_FaithSoul.name: The Betrayer of Faith's Soul

QST_Volcano_TreacherousSoul.desc: The Soul of a Warrior lost to Terror
QST_Volcano_TreacherousSoul.flavor: From the exterior, you'd never know who's soul this was or what their life was like.
QST_Volcano_TreacherousSoul.name: Tainted Soul

QST_ZakarumsPlight_Water.flavor: Bottle filled with water from the oasis for Zakarum Novitiate.
QST_ZakarumsPlight_Water.name: Water-filled bottle

Recipe_Elixir_Curative.desc: Bring to an Alchemist to teach them to craft Curative Elixirs.
Recipe_Elixir_Curative.name: Recipe: Curative Elixir

Ring_Rare_QST_Frac_GaleValley3_00.flavor: A daughter's lament for a mother lost ... Where madness begat tragedy ...
Ring_Rare_QST_Frac_GaleValley3_00.name: (PH) Vhenard's Signet

Ring_Rare_QST_Scos_Hills_05.flavor: (PH) Airidah's gift to Yorin, a druidic wardstone set into a ring inscribed with runes that bear the promise to keep the wearer safe.
Ring_Rare_QST_Scos_Hills_05.name: (PH) Sigil of Braestaig

Ring_Rare_QST_Scos_TheCrone.flavor: (PH) Contains traces of the Dark Thicket's corrupted magic
Ring_Rare_QST_Scos_TheCrone.name: (PH) The Crone's Blessing

Ring_Rare_QST_Scos_UnholyBloodlines_Una.flavor: [PH] A band of curious metal once with special properties that belonged to Una given her by her lost love. The band gave her fortitude and the last lonely tether to her withering humanity.
Ring_Rare_QST_Scos_UnholyBloodlines_Una.name: [PH] Una's Lament

SalvageScrap_Pelt_Bear.desc: Scrap items may be salvaged for crafting reagents or sold directly to vendors.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Bear.flavor: This heavy bear pelt is relatively unmarred by age or damage.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Bear.name: Thick Hide

SalvageScrap_Pelt_Beast.desc: Scrap items may be salvaged for crafting reagents or sold directly to vendors.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Beast.flavor: This heavy beast pelt is relatively unmarred by age or damage.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Beast.name: Heavy Pelt

SalvageScrap_Pelt_Bloodhawk.desc: Scrap items may be salvaged for crafting reagents or sold directly to vendors.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Bloodhawk.flavor: The skin of the Blood Hawk is thin yet surprisingly durable.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Bloodhawk.name: Thin Skin

SalvageScrap_Pelt_CreepyCrawly_Adult.desc: Scrap items may be salvaged for crafting reagents or sold directly to vendors.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_CreepyCrawly_Adult.flavor: This thick chitin seems to be in good condition.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_CreepyCrawly_Adult.name: Chitinous Plate

SalvageScrap_Pelt_CreepyCrawly_Mini.desc: Scrap items may be salvaged for crafting reagents or sold directly to vendors.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_CreepyCrawly_Mini.flavor: This insectoid carapace is tough and inflexible.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_CreepyCrawly_Mini.name: Tiny Carapace

SalvageScrap_Pelt_Quillrat.desc: Scrap items may be salvaged for crafting reagents or sold directly to vendors.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Quillrat.flavor: This prickly quillrat hide is in reasonably good condition.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Quillrat.name: Supple Skin

SalvageScrap_Pelt_Snake_Large.desc: Scrap items may be salvaged for crafting reagents or sold directly to vendors.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Snake_Large.flavor: This snake's skin is tough yet flexible.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Snake_Large.name: Snake Skin

SalvageScrap_Pelt_Snake_Small.desc: Scrap items may be salvaged for crafting reagents or sold directly to vendors.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Snake_Small.flavor: This snake's skin is tough yet flexible.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Snake_Small.name: Small Snake Skin

SalvageScrap_Pelt_Warg.desc: Scrap items may be salvaged for crafting reagents or sold directly to vendors.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Warg.flavor: This warg pelt is still damp with the creature's blood.
SalvageScrap_Pelt_Warg.name: Bloody Pelt

Scroll_Of_Amnesia.desc: PHResets and refunds all of your skill tree points and core stat points.
Scroll_Of_Amnesia.name: Scroll of Amnesia

Scroll_Of_Escape.desc: PHTeleports you to a random place in the world.
Scroll_Of_Escape.name: Scroll of Escape

Scroll_Of_Summoning.desc: PHSummons party members to your location.
Scroll_Of_Summoning.name: Scroll of Summoning

Scroll_Of_Wayfinding.desc: Returns you to the entrance of a Dungeon, and is consumed in the process.
Scroll_Of_Wayfinding.name: Scroll of Wayfinding

Scroll_TownPortal.desc: PHReturns you to your bound flame.
Scroll_TownPortal.name: Scroll of Town Portal

TownPortal_Fake_QuestReward.desc: Can be used to return to waypoints.
TownPortal_Fake_QuestReward.name: Town Portal

Treasure_Dungeon_FracturedPeaks_01.desc: This treasure item will sell for a tiny amount to vendors.
Treasure_Dungeon_FracturedPeaks_01.flavor: A pair of rusty, notched iron cleats. Broken and warped.
Treasure_Dungeon_FracturedPeaks_01.name: Broken Climbing Cleats

Wedding_Ring.flavor: "To Reyna. My love for you is like this ring. It has no end. - Donnell"
Wedding_Ring.name: Reyna's Wedding Ring

set_barb_002.desc:
You take 30% less damage when you are below half Life.
You deal 50% more damage to enemies below half Life.

legendary_generic_006.desc: Gain {10/20} resource for every 20.0% Life healed.
legendary_generic_006.name: Starlight

legendary_generic_009.desc: Basic skills grant 25.0% damage reduction for {4/8} seconds.
legendary_generic_009.name: of Might

legendary_generic_011.desc: Every {10/20} seconds, gain a Barrier absorbing up to 75% damage.
legendary_generic_011.name: of the Protector

legendary_generic_014.desc: Deal x{3/10}% increased damage for each second you stand still, up to x30.0%.
legendary_generic_014.name: of Inner Calm

legendary_generic_016.desc: Critical Strikes grant {8/16}% Movement Speed for 1.0 second. The duration can be extended.
legendary_generic_016.name: Wind Striker

legendary_generic_021.desc: Restore {1/4} resource when you Crowd Control an enemy.
legendary_generic_021.name: of the Umbral

legendary_generic_023.desc: Each consecutive Core Skill cast reduces the resource cost of your next Core Skills by {5/10}%, up to a maximum of 30.0%.
legendary_generic_023.name: Ominous

legendary_generic_027.desc: Deal x{23/33}% increased damage while you have a Barrier active.
legendary_generic_027.name: Conceited

legendary_generic_034.desc: When struck, a magical bubble forms around you for 8.0 seconds, absorbing 1000% damage. Can only occur once per {10/20} seconds.
legendary_generic_034.name: Protecting

legendary_generic_036.desc: Enemies afflicted with a damage over time effect deal {20/30}% less damage to you.
legendary_generic_036.name: of Disobedience

legendary_generic_038.desc: Deal x{40/50}% increased damage to Stunned, Knocked Down, and Frozen enemies.
legendary_generic_038.name: of Pummeling

legendary_generic_063.desc: Skills deal up to x{24/34}% increased damage based on available resource when cast, receiving the full benefit while at full resource.
legendary_generic_063.name: Edgemaster's

legendary_generic_065.desc: After standing still for {3/5} seconds, you regenerate 15 Life per second while enemies are Close.
legendary_generic_065.name: of the Patient Sage

legendary_generic_067.desc: Enemies hit with Basic Skills increases the damage of your next Core Skill by x{5/10}%, up to x50.0%.
legendary_generic_067.name: of the Expectant

legendary_generic_100.desc: You may move freely through enemies while below {40/70}% total Life.
legendary_generic_100.name: Ghostwalker

legendary_generic_102.desc: Lucky Strike: When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a {30/50}% chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.
legendary_generic_102.name: of Shared Misery

legendary_generic_103.desc: Taking {15/35}% of your total Life in damage while Stunned, Frozen or Immobilized will clear the effect.
legendary_generic_103.name: Eluding

legendary_generic_104.desc: When you take damage from a damage over time effect, gain {15/35} resource.
legendary_generic_104.name: Assimilation

legendary_generic_106.desc: Thorns damage dealt has a {20/40}% chance to deal damage to all enemies around you.
legendary_generic_106.name: Needleflare

legendary_generic_107.desc: While you have a Barrier active, there is a {20/30}% chance to ignore incoming direct damage from Distant enemies.
legendary_generic_107.name: of the Deflecting Barrier

legendary_generic_108.desc: Effects that heal you beyond 100.0% Life grant you a Barrier up to {50/100}% of your Maximum Life that lasts for 30.0 seconds.
legendary_generic_108.name: Restorative

legendary_generic_109.desc: Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by [Crit_Percent_Bonus_Vs_CC_Target_Any*100]% against Crowd Controlled enemies.
legendary_generic_109.name: Smiting

Loadscreen Tips.TIP001: Remember to spend your skill points when you level up to unlock new skills or improve old ones!
Loadscreen Tips.TIP003: Be sure to fill up your healing vials at the Healer before leaving town.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP004: Salvaging your items will produce materials used for crafting, and can also unlock new looks in your wardrobe
Loadscreen Tips.TIP005: Items lose durability and become less effective when you revive from death. You can repair your equipment at a Blacksmith
Loadscreen Tips.TIP006: You can revive other players by clicking on their spirits. They can rejoin the fight immediately!
Loadscreen Tips.TIP007: Activate any waypoints that you encounter on your travels to unlock a new fast travel location.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP008: When you grow powerful enough an Occultist can extract and replace the powers on your legendary items.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP009: Realm Rewards are shared with every character of yours on that realm. Open your map and check out the Renown panel to see what you can earn while exploring Sanctuary!
Loadscreen Tips.TIP010: The state of Sanctuary is based on the party leader's progress.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP011: Combat damage text is colored to mean different things: Critical Strike, Overpower, and Critical Hit combined with Overpower.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP012: You can increase the potency of your Healing Potion by visiting the Alchemist
Loadscreen Tips.TIP013: After finishing the campaign, new challenges and rewards await in the Nightmare, Hell and Torment world tiers!
Loadscreen Tips.TIP014: Elite enemies include Champions, Elites, Bosses, and hostile Players.
Loadscreen Tips.TIP015: Higher World Tiers grant you much higher experience bonus from killing monsters.
